name: Kabasujario

scripts.heroku-postbuild: ./node_modules/.bin/babel --source-maps --out-file public/camera-compiled.js --presets es2015 public/camera.js && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --source-maps --out-file public/client-compiled.js --presets es2015 public/client.js && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --source-maps --out-file public/game-compiled.js --presets es2015 public/game.js

author: Connor Weeks, Kunal Shah, Alex Kasparek
